Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Belmont, Racine, and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Belmont, Racine, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Roosevelt, Central Park, 16th & Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Roosevelt, Central Park, 16th and Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/Roosevelt.
